name: BeatBot
description:
Bots have taken over the town, They are OUT OF CONTROL!!!

(Controller Support / Recommended)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Keyboard - W, A, S, D & Arrow Keys (UP, Down)

Controller - A, X, B, Y & Left Analog Stick

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Goal of the game:

Defeat the enemy robots with music, get streaks to improve score multipliers. Get to a certain score and you win the battle.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
